page.title: 02Continuation of summary
page.content:
Staverton is a small village to the westof Daventry . It has a pub, one shop ,a small school , a church, a village hall and a green. It has many houses ranging from stone and thatch cottages to modern brick and tile houses. A bus comes to Staverton twice a week, so it is quite remote. The western industrial estate has an enormouse Fords warehouse and many other small factory units.
In the western part of the Grange Estate are the streets of The Witham andThe Cherwell. They have rented terraced houses.
